# Requires

## Usage
`@requires <someModuleName>`
 
## Overview
Documents that a module is needed to use this code.

## Example
```javascript
/**
* @module myModule
*/
export default myModule;

/**
 * @module myOtherModule
 * @requires myModule 
 */
import myModule from "myModule";
```

**[_More Info_](http://usejsdoc.org/tags-requires.html)**
